titles: A word of councel to the disaffected.
notes: Verse - "Will ye not fear? hath not th' Almighty shown".
In fact three poems, the others entitled: "To the same, upon the Scots recantation" and "To the same about Engaging."
Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan 9th 1650"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
